name: We are Eva
description:
Hi! My name is Eva, and I'm the main protagonist of the game you're looking at. This little platformer game is about me, yes. About me AND dimensional travel! But since you're reading this, you want to know more, huh?

Okay, well... It might sound weird, but I need your help, and this is why I am here, talking to you. You see, I am a peaceful creature... mostly... that lives in-between of dimensions. Usually, sleep is all I do (don't judge, you'd do the same), but not now, no. Because something is destroying those dimensions, and I want it to stop.
That's where I need you, human-player-thing, for your ability to see in 2D.
Yes, I am serious. I can travel between different dimensions whenever I want, but I can't see multiple of them simultaneously - however YOU can, with the help of your monitor.

Oh, I know, I know, another game needs its hero. I won't lie - it is what it is. But wouldn't you want to see what's out there? To help some fellow pixel-lady get some well-deserved sleep? We'll have fun, I promise... well, maybe not, maybe we'll both suffer horribly... but you'll never know if you don't try, right? I'll meet you there.

  • Play the game in multiple dimensions at the same time.
  • Amazing controls!
  • Freedom of movement.
  • Each dimension has its own rules.
  • Levels that change themselves.
  • And (of course) me, Eva.
